subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The top-seeded Carlos Moyá of Spain advanced to the Brazil Open final, surviving a late challenge to beat Ecuador’s Nicolas Lapentti, 6-2, 3-6, 7-6 (4), in a clay-court tournament in Costa do Sauipe, Brazil. Moyá will face the second-seeded Nicolas Almagro, a 6-1, 6-1 winner over Fabio Fognini.
